segments.text: So awful ! I never fancy my salary is so little .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , don't be so sad . You can ask for a salary raise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bingo ! I never thought about that before . I am working so hard and my accomplishment is significant , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you suppose you deserve a salary raise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know I deserve it , but I can not find a way to talk with boss about this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ought to point out how valuable you are , and tell her those people who have the same situation also get the salary raise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember it is the boss who hires you and tell her how much you have improved the office efficiency .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a point . It seems a little complicated . I will think about this for a while . I owe you one . After all , you give me an inspiration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forget it . Good luck . I hope you can make it .
segments.speaker: S2
